title: Winning
creator_credit: Victorian Film Corporation and David Morgan
brief_description: Two mentally handicapped people from Hotham House, Victoria, marry. Film deals with the problems they face and the help they receive when they leave the home and move into their own flat.
description: Two mentally handicapped people from Hotham House, Victoria, marry. Film deals with the problems they face and the help they receive when they leave the home and move into their own flat.
